question: A car travels at a speed of 60 km/hr and covers a particular distance in one hour. How long will it take for another car to cover the same distance at 40 km/hr?
explanation:
Distance = Speed $latex \\times$ Time = 60 km
Time taken at 40 km/hr $latex = \\frac{60}{40} = \\frac{3}{2}\\ hours&s=1$
Hence option [B] is correct answer
